entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Weird pattern matching behavior #63560

Updated

  • Expose "IsGeneratedCode" on analysis contexts #7578
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense not suggesting namespaces after `using` for top-level statements #58470
    17.3
  • "Change signature" drops namespace qualifier for alias-qualified names #63628
    Backlog
  • Function pointers shouldn't trigger IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #50976
    Backlog
  • Type test for ref struct is incorrect #63085
    17.4
  • Introduce IParameterSymbol.AssociatedSymbol to allow one to relate a primary constructor parameter to it's associated prop #54286
  • Allow user to restrict scope of namespace rename changes #39426
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not suggest 'nullable' keyword in pragma directive #63633
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a try/catch to help us track down a crash #63621
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix casing in VB file #63630
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
    Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63638
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
